Description: Rare Opportunity to buy one of my finest Private Collection guitars. This is a one owner guitar only used in my private studio. Always kept in humidified studio. Don't miss out on this one, she is a real beauty and one of the finest players guitars I have ever owned. The sounds produced from the 57/2008 pickups are so amazing that I rarely used the controls on my amps to modify the sound. The range and sustain on this guitar are second to none. Happy Bidding!! The newly updated PRS Guitars Modern Eagle II is an electric guitar that builds on the tradition of the Modern Eagle. To the premium grade wood, classic Modern Eagle frets and a Modern Eagle wide fat neck carve, The Modern Eagle II guitar adds an all-new pickup system and updated finishing techniques. PRS 1957/2008 pickups offered standard on the Modern Eagle II electric guitar give you both vintage and modern sounds. In 2008 PRS obtained exclusive rights to the original pickup wire used in the most revered pickups in the '50s. 1957 was the year the humbucker pickup was first commercially available, giving rise to the name 1957/2008 for these PRS pickups.
